greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (Sum_{n=-inf..inf} x^(n^2))^(-4).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) ~ (-1)^n * exp(2*Pi*sqrt(n)) / (32*n^(7/4)) * (1 - 35/(16*Pi*sqrt(n))). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015, extended Jan 16 2017
mathematica: nmax = 30; CoefficientList[Series[Product[((1 + (-x)^k)/(1 - (-x)^k))^4, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
